moves.1. e4: Starting out with my bread and butter.  Old Reliable.
moves.2. Bc4 Nf6 3. d3: It takes me a few moves to get my dudes in line for the first offensive, mainly because of the attack on my e4 pawn.
moves.3... Bc5 4. Nf3 O-O 5. O-O d6 6. h3 Bd7: I decided to ice the king's knight to open up the right channel for what would eventually become my main offensive.
moves.7... h6 8. Bxf6 Qxf6 9. c3 b5: My opponent's aggressiveness early on pushes me back into awkward positions.
moves.14. e5 Bxh3: For some reason, I can never see this little number coming.  Never.
moves.15. Nh4 Qg5 16. g3 Bg4: But, I actually do a pretty good job getting out of it.
moves.18... Be6 19. Nc3 Ba5 20. a3: Shit gets all retarded over here.
moves.20... b4 21. axb4 Bxb4 22. Bc2 g6 23. Ra: Even though I win this game, the sweetness of victory is soured by this jamburger on the a, b, and c files.
moves.24. f4: Starting to take advantage.  He begins to run at this point.
moves.29. Rh1 fxe5 30. Qe6+: Shhhh....Shhhhh. It's okay.  Go to sleep.
